mapper.select: select m.mat_req_id, m.bus_id, b.bus_name, m.mat_id, t.mat_name, t.mat_size, m.mat_req_qt, to_char(mat_req_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as mat_req_date, m.mat_req_stat, to_char(mat_end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as mat_end_date, m.emp_id, e.emp_name from mat_req m left join business b on m.bus_id = b.bus_id left join employee e on m.emp_id = e.emp_id left join material t on m.mat_id = t.mat_id order by TO_DATE(SUBSTR(mat_req_id, 4, 6), 'YYMMDD') desc, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(mat_req_id, INSTR(mat_req_id, '-') + 1)) desc

select m.mat_req_id, m.bus_id, b.bus_name, m.mat_id, t.mat_name, t.mat_size, m.mat_req_qt, to_char(mat_req_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as mat_req_date, m.mat_req_stat, to_char(mat_end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as mat_end_date, m.emp_id, e.emp_name from mat_req m left join business b on m.bus_id = b.bus_id left join employee e on m.emp_id = e.emp_id left join material t on m.mat_id = t.mat_id where m.mat_req_id = #{reqId} order by TO_DATE(SUBSTR(mat_req_id, 4, 6), 'YYMMDD') desc, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(mat_req_id, INSTR(mat_req_id, '-') + 1)) desc
mapper.insert: insert into mat_req (mat_req_id, bus_id, mat_id, mat_req_qt, mat_end_date, emp_id) values (get_mat_req_id, #{busId}, #{matId}, #{matReqQt}, #{matEndDate}, '12345')
mapper.select: select q.insp_std_id, q.insp_item_id, t.mat_name, q.suit_qt, to_char(q.insp_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as insp_date from qua_com q left join mat_req m on q.insp_std_id = m.mat_req_id left join material t on q.insp_item_id = t.mat_id where m.mat_req_stat = '검사완료' order by insp_date

select c.mat_rec_id, c.mat_req_id, c.insp_num, to_char(u.insp_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as insp_date, c.mat_rec_qt, c.mat_rec_type, to_char(c.mat_rec_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as mat_rec_date, l.mat_name, b.bus_name, c.mat_rec_note, e.emp_name, c.mat_lot_id from mat_rec c left join mat_req q on c.mat_req_id = q.mat_req_id left join qua_com u on c.insp_num = u.insp_num left join employee e on c.emp_id = e.emp_id left join business b on q.bus_id = b.bus_id left join material l on q.mat_id = l.mat_id

select m.mat_lot_id, m.mat_id, l.mat_name, l.mat_size, m.mat_qt, m.mat_hold_stat, to_char(c.mat_rec_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as mat_rec_date from mat_lot m left join mat_rec c on m.mat_rec_id = c.mat_rec_id left join material l on m.mat_id = l.mat_id

select s.prcs_pfmc_id, s.mat_lot_id, m.mat_name, s.mat_ship_type, s.mat_ship_date, s.mat_ship_qt, s.mat_ship_note, e.emp_name from mat_ship s left join mat_lot l on s.mat_lot_id = l.mat_lot_id left join material m on l.mat_id = m.mat_id left join employee e on s.emp_id = e.emp_id
select l.mat_lot_id, l.mat_id, m.mat_name, m.mat_size, l.mat_qt from mat_lot l left join material m on l.mat_id = m.mat_id order by l.mat_lot_id desc
select l.sp_lot_id, l.sp_id, s.sp_name, s.sp_size, l.sp_qt from sp_lot l left join semi_prod s on l.sp_id = s.sp_id

select s.prcs_pfmc_id, s.sp_lot_id, p.sp_name, s.sp_ship_type, to_char(s.sp_ship_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as sp_ship_date, s.sp_ship_qt, s.sp_ship_note, e.emp_name from sp_ship s left join sp_lot l on s.sp_lot_id = l.sp_lot_id left join semi_prod p on l.sp_id = p.sp_id left join employee e on s.emp_id = e.emp_id
